title: (x) Funky Art Deco serif face - Lightfoot {Irène Ellenberger}
content:
I'm looking for the font used for NIGHT FEVER (the "Bollywood" is Victorian, for anyone interested).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/event10665_4361.jpg)
author: lherrou

comments.content:
Lightfoot, it is a free font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lightfoot_3717.gif)

Nice! I love Paul Lloyd's work, and knew I had seen it before...

Link: [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052540/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/ "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/")

Good one.

@ MODs: Shouldn't Irene be credited for this one?
